select.if: select a.id, a.table_name, a.table_id, a.create_user_id, u.account, date_format(a.create_time,'%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time from t_attention a inner join t_user u on u.id = a.create_user_id where a.create_user_id = #{toUserId} and a.status = #{status} order by a.id desc limit 0,#{pageSize}

select a.id, a.table_name, a.table_id, a.create_user_id, u.account, date_format(a.create_time,'%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time from t_attention a inner join t_user u on u.id = a.create_user_id where a.create_user_id = #{toUserId} and a.status = #{status} and a.id > #{firstId} limit 0,#{pageSize}

mapper.select: select id from t_mood where status = #{status} and create_user_id != #{createUserId} order by rand() limit 1
